PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12562024-11-27ECCC
ActCanadian Net-Zero Emissions Accountability Act
PrecisReappointment of SIMON DONNER of Vancouver, British-Columbia, as a member of the Net-Zero Advisory Body, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years and his designation as co-chair of the Net-Zero Advisory Body, effective February 21, 2025.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of SIMON DONNER of Vancouver, British-Columbia, as a member of the Net-Zero Advisory Body, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years and his designation as co-chair of the Net-Zero Advisory Body, effective February 21, 2025.
